alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 01 at 12:41PM MDT until June 02 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. The strongest winds will occur below canyons on the east side of the Albuquerque metro area. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. Areas of blowing dust will reduce visibility and deteriorate air quality.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
